column1: # Mock-26 contains low-coverage samples to be removed with this command and file

# projectdir=$HOME/Desktop/projects/short-read-tax-assignment/data/mock-community/mock-26/; projectdir1=$HOME/Desktop/projects/short-read-tax-assignment/data/precomputed-results/mock-community/mock-26/unite_20.11.2016_clean_fullITS/expected/; source activate qiime1; filter_samples_from_otu_table.py -i $projectdir/feature_table.biom -o $projectdir/feature_table_1.biom --sample_id_fp $projectdir/samples-to-keep.tsv --negate_sample_id_fp; filter_samples_from_otu_table.py -i $projectdir1/table.L6-taxa.biom -o $projectdir1/feature_table_1.biom --sample_id_fp $projectdir/samples-to-keep.tsv --negate_sample_id_fp; mv $projectdir/feature_table_1.biom $projectdir/feature_table.biom; mv $projectdir1/feature_table_1.biom $projectdir1/table.L6-taxa.biom
